abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, runs East New York Clubhouse, which offers support for adults with mental illnesses like Simone Williams of Queens; draws $120 from fund to buy special shoes to help Williams with mobility problems stemming from diabetic neuropathy.

headline.print_headline: Woman Gains Hope, and Momentum, After an Exercise Class Awakens a Passion
headline.main: Woman Gains Hope, and Momentum, After an Exercise Class Awakens a Passion

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Simone Williams, beleaguered by diabetes and mobility issues, found a support network in exercise classes that helped her lose more than 120 pounds.
lead_paragraph: Simone Williams, beleaguered by diabetes and mobility issues, found a support network in exercise classes that helped her lose more than 120 pounds.
